table.name: equipment_type
table.description: This table categorizes the equipments from the Equipment table into various categories. The users in GC3 can define the individual equipments, or types of equipments or both.

columns.name: EQUIPMENT_TYPE_GID
columns.description: The GID for the equipment type. Equipment Types are used to define the characteristics of an equipment group. Using Intermodal Trailers as an example of an equipment group profile, the group in that profile could be 45' or 48' trailers. The equipment type against that group would be either a rollup or swing door trailer.

columns.name: EQUIPMENT_TYPE_XID
columns.description: The XID for the equipment type.

columns.name: EQUIPMENT_TYPE_NAME
columns.description: Text for the name of the equipment type.

columns.name: EQUIPMENT_DESC
columns.description: A textual description of the equipment type.

columns.name: EQUIPMENT_DESC_CODE
columns.description: The equipment description code is a user-defined code for the equipment type description.

columns.name: EQUIPMENT_DESC_CODE_DEF
columns.description: The equipment description code definition is a definition of the equipment type description code.

columns.name: ISO_EQUIPMENT_CODE
columns.description: This is the official International Standards Organization (ISO) code for the container that may be used with this equipment type (EDI element 24). This code identifies the size and type of container in a four-character format. The first and second characters specify the volume of the container, and the third and fourth characters specify the type. This code may or may not be the same as the equipment description code.

columns.name: ISO_EQUIPMENT_CODE_DEF
columns.description: The ISO equipment code definition is an explanation of the ISO equipment code.

columns.name: GROSS_WEIGHT
columns.description: The equipment type's gross weight.

columns.name: GROSS_WEIGHT_UOM_CODE
columns.description: Unit of measure for GROSS_WEIGHT column.

columns.name: GROSS_WEIGHT_BASE
columns.description: The gross weight in base units.

columns.name: TARE_WEIGHT
columns.description: Weight of the empty equipment type.

columns.name: TARE_WEIGHT_UOM_CODE
columns.description: Unit of measure for the tare weight.

columns.name: TARE_WEIGHT_BASE
columns.description: The tare weight in base units.

columns.name: NET_WEIGHT
columns.description: The net or nominal weight is the anticipated weight capacity of the shipment that can be contained within the equipment type.

columns.name: NET_WEIGHT_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The unit of measure related to the net or nominal weight.

columns.name: NET_WEIGHT_BASE
columns.description: The net weight in base units.

columns.name: VOLUME
columns.description: The volume of the equipment type.

columns.name: VOLUME_UOM_CODE
columns.description: Unit of measure for VOLUME column.

columns.name: VOLUME_BASE
columns.description: The volume in base units.

columns.name: METRIC3
columns.description: The Metric field represents an additional level of detail for a shipment on a given equipment type. For example, you can enter information about items being transported without packaging, such as a number of garments not packed into crates or onto pallets but instead placed on hangers. This number must be no greater than eight digits.

columns.name: METRIC4
columns.description: The Metric field represents an additional level of detail for a shipment on a given equipment type. For example, you can enter information about items being transported without packaging, such as a number of garments not packed into crates or onto pallets but instead placed on hangers. This number must be no greater than eight digits.

columns.name: INTERIOR_LENGTH
columns.description: The length of the equipment type's interior.

columns.name: INTERIOR_LENGTH_UOM_CODE
columns.description: Unit of measure for INTERIOR_LENGTH column.

columns.name: INTERIOR_LENGTH_BASE
columns.description: The interior length in base units.

columns.name: INTERIOR_WIDTH
columns.description: The width of the equipment type's interior.

columns.name: INTERIOR_WIDTH_UOM_CODE
columns.description: Unit of measure for INTERIOR_WIDTH column.

columns.name: INTERIOR_WIDTH_BASE
columns.description: The interior width in base units.

columns.name: INTERIOR_HEIGHT
columns.description: The height of the equipment type's interior.

columns.name: INTERIOR_HEIGHT_UOM_CODE
columns.description: Unit of measure for INTERIOR_HEIGHT column.

columns.name: INTERIOR_HEIGHT_BASE
columns.description: The interior height in base units.

columns.name: EXTERIOR_LENGTH
columns.description: The length of the exterior of the equipment type.

columns.name: EXTERIOR_LENGTH_UOM_CODE
columns.description: Unit of measure for EXTERIOR_LENGTH column.

columns.name: EXTERIOR_LENGTH_BASE
columns.description: The exterior length in base units.

columns.name: EXTERIOR_WIDTH
columns.description: The width of the exterior of the equipment type.

columns.name: EXTERIOR_WIDTH_UOM_CODE
columns.description: Unit of measure for EXTERIOR_WIDTH column.

columns.name: EXTERIOR_WIDTH_BASE
columns.description: The exterior width in base units.

columns.name: EXTERIOR_HEIGHT
columns.description: The height of the exterior of the equipment type.

columns.name: EXTERIOR_HEIGHT_UOM_CODE
columns.description: Unit of measure for EXTERIOR_HEIGHT column.

columns.name: EXTERIOR_HEIGHT_BASE
columns.description: The exterior height in base units.

columns.name: TEMPERATURE_CONTROL
columns.description: Check box used to enable temperature control functionality to be used for this equipment type.

columns.name: TEMPERATURE_CONTROL_GID
columns.description: A GID to define the temperature controls value for the commodity.

columns.name: TAG1
columns.description: Tag fields, like attribute fields, are available to store additional information associated with this piece of equipment.

columns.name: TAG2
columns.description: Tag fields, like attribute fields, are available to store additional information associated with this piece of equipment.

columns.name: TAG3
columns.description: Tag fields, like attribute fields, are available to store additional information associated with this piece of equipment.

columns.name: TAG4
columns.description: Tag fields, like attribute fields, are available to store additional information associated with this piece of equipment.

columns.name: SUBSTITUTE_EQ_TYPE_PROFILE_GID
columns.description: Indicates which equipment types can be substituted for this type in fleet equipment planning.

columns.name: DOMAIN_NAME
columns.description: Database domain where this data is stored.

columns.name: INSERT_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data insert user.

columns.name: INSERT_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of data insert.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data update user.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of the most recent data update.
